casebody.data:
(J.Z.-Petitioner) C-934 September Term 2017
080658 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 15, 2018

In the MATTER OF the CIVIL COMMITMENT OF J.Z., SVP-342-03.

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004231-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
